text: the second is the duration of
9,192,631,770 my relationship with time
is generally quite good at every light
people being late I don't like it being
early either to be honest but I've often
wondered what it actually is I mean time
is construct obviously what is a second
how do you know what it is if you can't
look at something that shows you what a
second is same for an inch or a
millimeter or 50 grams if you're on a
desert island and you didn't have a
point of reference you wouldn't be able
to say well it's that we don't actually
know what any of these things are we're
just told them and we accept it what if
it's not true
turns out in the case of the second it
isn't true
that's why you're always not 0.6 of a
second late every year
